name: Abandon (Audio Only Horror Game)
description:
An alien beast stalks the pitch black corridors of the starship Astraea. In this deadly game of cat and mouse, can you gather the components necessary to launch the escape pod and reach freedom? Or will the monster consume you as it did the rest of the crew?

If you can manage to escape, can you also uncover the hidden objectives along the way?

Abandon is an audio-only game. This means you'll be using sound cues to navigate your environment and avoid the beast. 

Be careful though, the same sounds of bumping walls and opening doors that you use to find your way could lead the creature right to you!

You'll use wasd to move forward, left, right, and backwards, and the arrow keys to turn left and right.

Quality headphones are recommended, as effectively using the 3d sound environment is your best bet to escape.

This game was designed for the Horror Game Jam #6, whose theme was "Among the Stars"
